tool_description: Validates and confirms portrait photography locations, checking accessibility, permits, lighting conditions, and logistics requirements.

location_type.description: Type of location: studio, outdoor, client_home, venue, beach, park, urban

session_date.description: Planned session date for location validation

session_time.description: Planned session time for lighting assessment

group_size.description: Number of people in the photo session (1 to 50)

error_messages: Invalid location type: Use one of [studio, outdoor, client_home, venue, beach, park, urban].
Location not accessible: The specified location cannot be accessed or is not suitable for photography.
Permit required: This location requires photography permits that must be obtained in advance.
Invalid session timing: The date/time must be in the future and during allowable hours.
Group size too large: The location cannot accommodate the specified group size.
Weather concerns: Outdoor location may have weather-related challenges for the planned date.
usage: Provide location_type, specific_location, session_date, session_time, and group_size to validate location suitability and identify any requirements or restrictions.

validation_status.description: Location validation result: approved, conditional, or rejected

permit_required.description: Whether photography permits are needed for this location

lighting_assessment.description: Lighting conditions assessment: excellent, good, challenging, or poor

backup_locations.description: List of alternative locations if primary location has issues

equipment_recommendations.description: Suggested additional equipment needed for this location
